1282960.name: Fault - Founders Pack
1282960.description:
FOUNDERS PACK
Enhance your Fault experience and get ahead of the curve. Owning the Founders Pack will enlist all 14 early access launch heroes to your roster and grant you 1,000 Coins (Fault's premium currency) to spend on cosmetics.

1,000 COINS
Grant $10's worth of Fault's premium currency. Purchase additional Heroes, unlock a fresh new skin for your favourite or any of the additional cosmetics available in the Fault store.

14 HEROES
  • Boris
  • Countess
  • Gideon
  • Greystone
  • Khaimera
  • Kwang
  • Lt. Belica
  • Murdock
  • Muriel
  • Narbash
  • Sparrow
  • Steel
  • Twinblast
1282960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
